download.title: Download Your QQQ App
download.description: Search 'QQQ App' from App Store or Google Play. Or you can click the Badge link below.
link.title: Link Your QEdge
link.description: Go to QQQ App Home screen and tap the + button. Scan the QR code below and link your QEdge with QQQ App.
gain.title: Gain The QQQ With Us
gain.description: Link success! Start your personal QEdge naming and styles. Gain QQQ value with now.
